channel.title: Postal 3... any news?
channel.description:
I'm really looking forward to Postal 3, especially because it just looks so beautiful on the Source engine. But there're absolutely no updates on the site and the forums have been disabled.
Does anyone know if this thing is still going? Have there been any recent updates because the last one is from two years ago!

item.title: Postal 3... any news?
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Ah, Postal 2. Such a terrible game that I couldn’t stop playing.
If only the AI was good, the sound the guns made actually sounded fun (the M4 especially sounds like shit), and the game wasn’t so broken, it probably would of been a masterpiece.
But, for now, it’s at best a mediocre shooter that’s worth a few shits and giggles. I don’t care what you say, launching napalm rockets at elephants, kicking defenseless people to the ground, hitting their heads off with a shovel and pissing on the remains is funny!

Postal 3, however, looks great!

Read full topic
